translation.en: - Hello. - Hi.
Wow, you look great.
I love this.
- Shall we get started? - Yes.
Are you looking for love?
Uh, yes. Unquestionably so.
I don't want to be single forever, no. 'Cause I don't wanna feel lonely.
translation.es: No quiero estar soltera para siempre, no quiero sentirme sola.

translation.en: I haven't dated in 33 years.
translation.es: Nunca tuve una cita, en 33 años.

translation.en: It's… It's really hard.
To have a lovely lady,
oh my goodness,
I'm all for it.
Finding love can be hard for anyone.
translation.es: Encontrar el amor puede ser difícil.

translation.en: Keep looking for that fish in your pond.
You're in competition with - all the other young men. -
translation.es: Estás compitiendo con los demás jóvenes.

translation.en: And for some people, it can feel like an impossible dream.
translation.es: Para algunos, puede parecer un sueño inalcanzable.

translation.en: Uh, let's change the topic. Can we change the topic?
You find your Prince Charming. I find my Cinderella. Bam!
translation.es: Encuentra a tu príncipe azul, yo encontraré a mi Cenicienta.

translation.en: This series follows people on the autism spectrum…
translation.es: Esta serie sigue a gente en el espectro autista…

translation.en: I dub thee Sir James.
Through this process, he might find love.
translation.es: Con este proceso, podría encontrar el amor.

translation.en: - Oh yeah. - Yeah.
…as they navigate the confusing world of relationships…
translation.es: …mientras navegan por el confuso mundo de las relaciones…

translation.en: I really like how you hold my hand.
translation.es: Me gusta que me tomes de la mano.

translation.en: …and dating.
Do you wanna be my girlfriend?
- Hello. - How's things going?
- Good. How are you? - I'm doing fine. Thank you so much.
translation.es: - Bien, ¿y tú? - Estoy bien, muchas gracias.

translation.en: - So you're ready for this? - Um, you bet.
translation.es: ¿Estás lista para esto? Claro que sí.

translation.en: My name is Dani.
I am 26 years old.
You could say I have a mixture of six different nationalities.
translation.es: Tengo una mezcla de seis nacionalidades diferentes.

translation.en: So mostly Mexican, Caucasian, and a smidge of Asian.
translation.es: Soy mexicana, caucásica y un poco asiática.

translation.en: I am single, and I am on the autism spectrum.
translation.es: Soy soltera y estoy en el espectro autista.

translation.en: - Are you looking for love, Dani? - I am.
Unfortunately, it's just so hard to find a boyfriend.
translation.es: Por desgracia, encontrar un novio es muy difícil.

translation.en: It's…
You could imagine, I have to kiss many frogs to find the right guy.
translation.es: Tengo que besar muchas ranas para encontrar al hombre adecuado.

translation.en: It's not just about the looks.
translation.es: No solo importa cómo se ve.

translation.en: I'm looking for somebody who is motivated and has really great hygiene,
translation.es: Busco a alguien motivado y con buena higiene personal,

translation.en: because I don't like bad breath.
translation.es: porque no me gusta el mal aliento.

translation.en: Dani lives in Los Angeles with her aunt and uncle.
translation.es: Dani vive en Los Ángeles con sus tíos.

translation.en: - Serve you some coffee. - Thank you.
She's lived with them since she was 11 years old.
translation.es: Vive con ellos desde que tenía 11 años.

translation.en: It's hard for me to find the right person who is so much like me.
translation.es: Es difícil encontrar a la persona adecuada que se parezca a mí.

translation.en: - I've been desperate to look for love. - Don't be desperate, Dani.
translation.es: Estoy desesperada por encontrar el amor. No te desesperes.

translation.en: I want somebody with a career who can win good bucks, good salaries.
translation.es: Quiero a alguien con un buen trabajo, que pueda ganar mucho dinero.

translation.en: I need somebody who's financially secure, who can maintain a company.
translation.es: Necesito a alguien que tenga seguridad financiera.

translation.en: You're not a gold digger, are you, Dani?
- Yeah. - Yeah.
translation.es: - No eres una cazafortunas, ¿no? - Sí. - ¿Qué? - Sí.

translation.en: Know what a gold digger is?
Gold digger means they're trying to look for guys who are rich.
translation.es: Es alguien que busca a un tipo rico.

translation.en: - Yes. - Is that you?
- Pretty much, but… -
Yeah, I think where that comes from is her dad.
translation.es: Creo que eso lo sacó de su padre.

translation.en: My sister, which is her mom, and her husband were married.
translation.es: Mi hermana, su mamá, estaba casada con su papá.

translation.en: He didn't work.
So he was always at home with the girls while my sister was working all the time.
translation.es: Se quedaba en casa con las chicas mientras mi hermana trabajaba.

translation.en: So she doesn't want that.
It's called a dysfunctional upbringing.
Yeah, but you turned out just fine. Both you and your sister, right?
translation.es: Sí, pero tu hermana y tú salieron bien, ¿no?

translation.en: - Right? - Yes.
I wanted to find somebody special, somebody who can depend on me.
translation.es: Quería encontrar a alguien especial que pudiera depender de mí.

translation.en: We want to depend on each other,
and work together to have a sustainable living.
translation.es: y trabajar juntos en una vida sustentable.

translation.en: My aunt would tell me,
There's many fish in the sea. You'll eventually catch a big one.
translation.es: Hay muchos peces en el mar, ya atraparás uno grande.

translation.en: You'll eventually catch a whale.
Well…
It's a metaphor.
You remember your practice boyfriend? Well, um, I do.
translation.es: - ¿Recuerdas a tu novio de práctica? - Sí.

translation.en: What's a practice boyfriend, Dani?
A practice boyfriend is, um, somebody that you, um, use for practicing.
translation.es: Un novio de práctica es alguien a quien usas para practicar.

translation.en: What kind of things did you practice?
Kissing and, um…
To her, it was just practice. To him, it was like, I have a girlfriend.
translation.es: Para ella era solo práctica. Él decía: Tengo novia.

translation.en: I didn't say, It's a practice. I never mentioned that.
translation.es: Nunca le dije que era de práctica.

translation.en: - So you crushed his heart? - Yeah.
Because she wanted to learn how to kiss,
so we looked up a YouTube video about how to learn how to kiss,
translation.es: así que buscamos un video en YouTube para aprender a besar,

translation.en: and they used a cupcake to show how to kiss.
translation.es: y usaron una magdalena para mostrar cómo besar.

translation.en: So then she picked that up and started using that with boys.
translation.es: Ella aprendió y empezó a hacerlo con chicos.

translation.en: But how do you do it?
Hold up a cupcake, like you're licking the icing.
translation.es: Sostienes una magdalena y lames el glaseado.

translation.en: So romantic.
- No. -
Okay, you're grossing out Uncle.
translation.es: Le estás dando asco a tu tío.

translation.en: Patrick, you're so sensitive.
I'm Abbey, but my real name is Abigail, but people call me Abbey for short.
translation.es: Soy Abbey, mi nombre real es Abigail, pero la gente me llama Abbey para abreviar.

translation.en: - You are on the spectrum, Abbey? - Yes.
Speaking of, autism makes me feel like not human.
translation.es: Hablar del autismo me hace sentir que no soy humana.

translation.en: Why is that?
I don't know. It's just because I feel like Ariel in The Little Mermaid.
translation.es: No lo sé. Me siento como Ariel en La sirenita

translation.en: When I can't get my words out, I feel like Ariel.
translation.es: cuando no logro decir lo que quiero.

translation.en: It's like how I want to be typical, Ariel wants to be a human.
translation.es: Ariel quiere ser humana como yo quiero ser neurotípica.

translation.en: And she becomes human, she can't talk. That's how I feel.
translation.es: Cuando se vuelve humana, no puede hablar. Así me siento.

translation.en: - Hey, Cian. - Hey.
This is my room. A lot of stuff in it.
translation.es: Esta es mi habitación, tiene muchas cosas.

translation.en: These are my lions and all that.
translation.es: Estos son mis leones y todo eso.

translation.en: I love princesses, but I do not like the villains.
translation.es: Me encantan las princesas y no me gustan los villanos.

translation.en: Villains are kind of…
I think more boys are interested in them.
translation.es: Creo que a los chicos les gustan.

translation.en: Girls seem to like stuffed animals and all that,
translation.es: A las chicas les gustan los peluches

translation.en: and I bet the Disney princesses love stuffed animals.
translation.es: y seguro que a las princesas de Disney le gustan los peluches.

translation.en: So, Abbey, are you looking for love? Yes.
'Cause I wanna be like a princess, like Cinderella going to the ball.
translation.es: Quiero ser como una princesa, como Cenicienta yendo al baile.

translation.en: And have you been in love before?
Yes, I have. In school, in high school.
Being in love made me feel romantic.
translation.es: Estar enamorada me hizo sentir romántica.

translation.en: I felt safe, and it meant a lot to me.
translation.es: Me sentí segura, significó mucho para mí.

translation.en: I'd like to go on a date with a boy who has things in common with me
translation.es: Quiero tener una cita con alguien con quien tenga cosas en común.

translation.en: is what I want, is the most important thing.
So he could understand my autism.
We could do things. We could go to water parks.
translation.es: y podríamos hacer cosas como ir a parques acuáticos.

translation.en: We could go to the beach, the zoo.
translation.es: Podríamos ir a la playa, al zoológico.

translation.en: Maybe we can go on a double date with another autistic couple.
translation.es: Podríamos tener una cita doble con otra pareja autista.

translation.en: Double date!
You're so cute! You're so cute!
Abbey lives with her mom, Christine, and her brother, Ben.
translation.es: Abbey vive con su mamá, Christine, y su hermano, Ben.

translation.en: Peel and then put it in there, okay?
Okay.
- This is messy. - This is a little bit complicated.
This is a mess.
Well, how can you clean it up, girl?
It's hard.
I saw how Abbey was with her first boyfriend,
translation.es: Vi cómo estaba con su primer novio.

translation.en: and it was truly one of the most beautiful things.
And I want that for her.
And I know she wants it, but she's a little scared.
translation.es: Y sé que ella lo quiere, pero tiene miedo.

translation.en: When was Abbey diagnosed with autism?
She was maybe two,
and she was putting everything in her mouth, running around…
translation.es: y se metía todo en la boca y corría como…

translation.en: It was a chore. I remember thinking, I can't wait till this stage is over,
translation.es: Daba mucho trabajo, y pensé: Espero que esta etapa termine,

translation.en: 'cause this is really awful.
But then I put her in a pre-- preschool
translation.es: Pero luego entró en un preescolar

translation.en: and four days into it, the preschool called me and said…
translation.es: y al cuarto día me llamaron y me dijeron:

translation.en: We can't have your kid in here.
translation.es: Su hija no puede seguir aquí.

translation.en: So the journey began.
I took her in, I got her diagnosed, and I didn't want to believe it.
translation.es: Cuando la diagnosticaron no quería creerlo.

translation.en: And on a good note,
what she's doing now, I could have never imagined she would be capable of doing.
translation.es: es que nunca imaginé que sería capaz de hacer lo que está haciendo ahora.

translation.en: - Abbey, which one is that? - It's Moana.
- That's a Disney thing, right? - Uh- huh.
Oh, wonderful. Okay.
- All right, how was your day today? - You know, it was great.
You know the actress who does the voice of Moana is Ben's age.
translation.es: La actriz que hace la voz de Moana tiene la edad de Ben.

translation.en: - Okay. - Who's this gentleman here, Abbey?
- This is Mike. - Yes.
He's like my stepfather. He has a husband named Bob.
translation.es: Es como mi padrastro. Tiene un esposo llamado Bob.

translation.en: They're together.
We live in the back. The guesthouse.
translation.es: - Vivimos atrás. - En la casa de huéspedes.

translation.en: Dinner's ready.
Oh, Clemmy's here.
She's waiting for--
She's waiting for us.
Anything that drops on the ground is Clem's, right?
translation.es: Todo lo que cae al suelo es de Clem, ¿no?

translation.en: So why don't you tell Bob and Mike what you're doing, Abbey?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no les cuentas qué haces?

translation.en: - She is gonna start going out more, right? - Yeah.
translation.es: - Va a empezar a salir más, ¿no? - Sí.

translation.en: Maybe go on a few dates.
- Where would be your dream place to go? - A cruise in Africa.
translation.es: - ¿Adónde te gustaría ir? - A un crucero en África.

translation.en: - A cruise. - Yeah.
- I've not ever been-- - Mm, and an indoor water park.
translation.es: - Nunca… - Y a un parque acuático cubierto.

translation.en: It would be nice to see her go out with a nice boy.
translation.es: Sería lindo que saliera con un buen chico.

translation.en: What do you think, Ben, about your sister going on a date?
translation.es: ¿Qué opinas de que tu hermana tenga citas?

translation.en: - If she meets the right person… - Right?
translation.es: Creo que sería bueno que conociera a la persona adecuada.

translation.en: …that'd be good. I still get those brotherly instincts once in a while.
translation.es: Creo que sería bueno que conociera a la persona adecuada. Aunque quiero protegerla.

translation.en: I know, right?
So what else do you want to find in a boyfriend?
translation.es: ¿Qué más quieres encontrar en un novio?

translation.en: He needs to understand my autism.
And he'd have to be funny, like us.
- 'Cause, you know… - And handsome, like someone at the table.
translation.es: Y guapo, como alguien en la mesa.

translation.en: - - You guys!
- Hello there. - Oh, yes, hello. How are you doing today?
My name is James. I am 34 years old.
I have Asperger's syndrome. I do not allow it to limit me.
translation.es: Tengo síndrome de Asperger. No permito que me limite, no me define.

translation.en: It does not define me, and yes, I am seeking love.
translation.es: No permito que me limite, no me define. Y sí, busco el amor.

translation.en: I'm seeking to find a partner, you know, a soul mate
translation.es: Busco una compañera, mi alma gemela,

translation.en: with whom I can spend my life.
At the time that I was diagnosed,
society did not have a great understanding of Asperger's syndrome or autism,
translation.es: la sociedad no entendía muy bien el síndrome de Asperger o el autismo,

translation.en: so, sadly, help-- It was difficult to find help.
translation.es: así que, lamentablemente, fue difícil conseguir ayuda.

translation.en: Mm, as sad as it is, other students mocked me and bullied me.
translation.es: Por más triste que sea, los otros estudiantes se burlaban de mí.

translation.en: That did have an effect on my self- esteem.
I would always be terribly nervous being in large crowds
translation.es: Siempre me ponía muy nervioso si estaba en una multitud

translation.en: or being outside my house for any significant duration.
translation.es: o fuera de mi casa por mucho tiempo.

translation.en: With practice, though, I overcame that.
Now I have no problem at all, becoming more confident
translation.es: Ahora no tengo problemas, me siento seguro con otras personas y en multitudes.

translation.en: in being around other people, being in large crowds.
translation.es: me siento seguro con otras personas y en multitudes.

translation.en: James lives with his family in Massachusetts.
translation.es: James vive con su familia en Massachusetts.

translation.en: All these stones I have over here are certainly not for any practical use,
translation.es: Todas estas piedras que tengo aquí no tienen ningún uso práctico,

translation.en: but they're interesting conversation pieces.
translation.es: pero son un tema de conversación.

translation.en: They add character to the room.
This here is a type of glass called fulgurite.
translation.es: Este es un tipo de vidrio llamado fulgurita.

translation.en: It happens when lightning strikes sand.
translation.es: Se crea si un rayo cae en la arena.

translation.en: This is a preserved alligator head from Louisiana.
translation.es: Esta es una cabeza de caimán de Luisiana.

translation.en: Isn't that something?
I have a Japanese katana and a European longsword.
translation.es: Una katana japonesa y una espada larga europea.

translation.en: This is a cheap display unit. This one could not be used in battle,
translation.es: Esta es una copia barata, no se podría usar en una batalla.

translation.en: but this sword is actually fully functional.
I got it at King Richard's Faire from one of their blacksmiths,
translation.es: Se la compré a un herrero en una feria,

translation.en: and the blacksmiths there assured me that everything they forge, though, is fully functional.
translation.es: y me aseguró que todo lo que forja es completamente funcional.

translation.en: So, yes, I mean, in the rare chance I ever had to use it in battle, I could.
translation.es: Así que podría usarlo en una batalla, si se diera la ocasión.

translation.en: A good friend will bail you out of jail,
translation.es: Un buen amigo paga tu fianza,

translation.en: but a true friend will be sitting next to you saying,
translation.es: pero un verdadero amigo va preso contigo,

translation.en: 'Damn, that was fun!'
Yes, I really like that plaque a lot, and…
translation.es: Sí, me gusta mucho esta placa.

translation.en: Oh, these are stamps with classic movie monsters.
translation.es: Estas son estampillas con monstruos de películas.

translation.en: These are stamps with classic American aircraft.
I'm never going to use them.
I'm just keeping those there as conversation pieces.
translation.es: Las tengo como temas de conversación.

translation.en: Who comes in here for the conversation pieces?
translation.es: ¿Quién viene por los temas de conversación?

translation.en: Um, actually, nobody really.
This is… It's just… I guess it's for my own benefit.
I've made myself accounts on various online dating services.
translation.es: Hice cuentas en varios servicios de citas en línea.

translation.en: There have been times where I… match with… with a… with a woman on the site,
translation.es: Pude conversar con algunas mujeres en los sitios web,

translation.en: and none of them have ever agreed to meet me in person,
translation.es: pero ninguna aceptó verme en persona.

translation.en: as sad as that is.
Oh, yeah, see?
This cane here
is made out of bullet casings that have been welded together.
translation.es: está hecho de vainas de balas soldadas.

translation.en: Pretty cool, wouldn't you say?
Show them the cane that belonged to your great- grandfather.
translation.es: Muéstrales el bastón de tu bisabuelo.

translation.en: This one?
Oh, yes, this belonged to one of my ancestors.
translation.es: Perteneció a uno de mis ancestros.

translation.en: - He died in 1943. - Okay.
This is my father, Lawrence.
- Where's Mom? - Oh.
- Come on over, Mom. - Oh.
- Hello. - Uh, yes.
- This is my mother, June. - How are you doing?
translation.es: - Ella es mi madre, June. - ¿Cómo estás?

translation.en: - I'm feeling slightly nervous. - Can I sit?
Of course. Oh, yes, that's right, Mom, King Richard's Faire will be open soon.
translation.es: Claro. Por cierto, pronto abrirá la feria.

translation.en: Yeah! You were telling me. Wanna sit?
- I'm gonna invite my friends. - What are you going to wear?
translation.es: - Invitaré a mis amigos. - ¿Qué te vas a poner?

translation.en: Oh, yes, I'll wear my full… all my medieval regalia, as I so often do.
translation.es: Usaré mi atuendo medieval, como de costumbre.

translation.en: - Can you show it to us? -
I guess so. Please wait a moment.
- - Okay, so how does this look?
- Isn't that something? - Yeah. That's great.
- Now, you need a cane, a formal cane. - Don't you have your own cane?
translation.es: - Necesitas un bastón formal. - ¿No tienes tu propio bastón?

translation.en: - What about this one? - Yeah, that's good.
Yes.
What do you think?
It goes great with your dungarees!
Oh, mm, yeah, well, I don't have time to change into all the clothing, you know,
translation.es: No tengo tiempo para ponerme toda la ropa,

translation.en: but it's still pretty cool, isn't it?
- It's very cool. - Yes.
Yes. I'm going to put these away.
- Please wait a moment. - Okay.
All right. Please wait a moment.
He's a very family- oriented young man,
translation.es: Es un joven muy enfocado en su familia

translation.en: and, uh, uh… we want… we want the best for him, you know.
translation.es: y queremos lo mejor para él.

translation.en: Like any parent does.
He's got a very… a very kind heart. Um…
He would do anything for a friend or family.
translation.es: Haría lo que fuera por un amigo o un familiar.

translation.en: We can't wait to see you with a lovely lady.
translation.es: Queremos verte con una chica encantadora.

translation.en: - Oh, yes. Thank you very much. -
You know what?
We love your hair, James,
but I think, because of the two different colors,
translation.es: pero creo que, como tienes dos colores distintos,

translation.en: it might be a really good idea to professionally have it cut and colored.
translation.es: sería una buena idea que te lo corte y tiña un profesional.

translation.en: I do plan to do that.
That way, when you first meet someone, you're gonna make a better impression.
translation.es: Cuando conozcas a alguien, causarás una mejor impresión.

translation.en: Yes. Yes, of course.
You know, as a young man, it's expected of you to attract a young lady, okay?
translation.es: Como eres joven, se espera de ti que atraigas a una jovencita.

translation.en: And without looking at your watch all the time. - - You know?
translation.es: Y sin mirar tu reloj todo el tiempo.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Well, I am glad I'm so young from your perspective.
translation.es: Lo siento. Me alegra ser joven desde tu perspectiva.

translation.en: You're in competition with all the other young men
who are trying to pair up - with a young lady, okay? - Yes.
translation.es: que intentan formar pareja con una jovencita.

translation.en: So, it's important for you to make yourself - attractable, okay? - Yes, I know that.
translation.es: - Es importante que veas atractivo. - Sí, lo sé.

translation.en: So, James, we've got a date lined up for you on Saturday.
translation.es: James, tenemos una cita para ti el sábado.

translation.en: - Oh, really? That's pretty great. - Oh, wow!
Do I get to come to the restaurant and hide and peek and watch?
translation.es: ¿Puedo ir al restaurante y esconderme para espiar?

translation.en: Give me a break, Mom. I'm 34, okay?
translation.es: Déjame en paz, mamá. Tengo 34 años, ¿sí?

translation.en: I'm kidding. I'm kidding, sweetie.
Clementine, do you need a treat again?
This dog could eat all day long.
translation.es: Esta perra puede comer todo el día.

translation.en: Is she gonna be a fat dog?
This is LA. You cannot be a fat dog in Los Angeles.
translation.es: No puedes ser una perra gorda en Los Ángeles.

translation.en: What's the hardest thing about dating?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo más difícil de las citas?

translation.en: You have to talk to your boyfriend a lot, and that can be hard for me.
translation.es: Debes hablar mucho con tu novio y eso es difícil para mí.

translation.en: Like when I was dating Garrett, he was kind of…
He was interested in history, and I wasn't.
translation.es: A él le interesaba la historia y a mí no.

translation.en: But he did like Star Wars, and I like Star Wars.
translation.es: Pero a los dos nos gusta Star Wars.

translation.en: We had that in common.
Autism expert Jennifer Cook is visiting Abbey
translation.es: Jennifer Cook, experta en autismo, visita a Abbey

translation.en: to help her in her search for love.
I was identified as being on the spectrum about ten years ago,
translation.es: Me diagnosticaron que estaba en el espectro hace unos diez años

translation.en: and it made everything beforehand in my life make sense.
translation.es: y eso hizo que todo en mi vida tuviera sentido.

translation.en: Hi.
- Hi, I'm Jennifer. - Hi, I'm Abbey.
translation.es: - Hola, soy Jennifer. - Hola, soy Abbey.

translation.en: - Nice to meet you. - Nice to meet you too.
Autism really means it's a constellation of behaviors and challenges and aptitudes,
translation.es: El autismo es una constelación de comportamientos, desafíos y aptitudes.

translation.en: but we're all dealing with sensory sensitivities.
translation.es: Pero todos lidiamos con sensibilidad sensorial

translation.en: We're all dealing with challenges with social cues.
translation.es: y con desafíos en las interacciones sociales.

translation.en: - Hi. I'm Jennifer. - Hi, Jennifer. I'm Christine.
translation.es: - Hola, soy Jennifer. - Hola, soy Christine.

translation.en: - Nice to meet you, Christine. - Nice to meet you. Welcome.
But I can promise that what's going on in the inside
translation.es: Pero lo que sucede adentro a menudo no tiene nada que ver

translation.en: often has nothing to do with what's shown on the outside.
translation.es: Pero lo que sucede adentro a menudo no tiene nada que ver con lo que se muestra afuera.

translation.en: Your hair reminds me of Ariel in The Little Mermaid.
translation.es: Tu cabello me recuerda a Ariel, de La sirenita.

translation.en: - Thank you. -
I really understand Ariel,
because when she was singing her Part of Your World song, she couldn't get the words out.
translation.es: porque en la canción Parte de él no le salían las palabras.

translation.en: And when I can't get my words out, I feel exactly like that.
translation.es: Y cuando no puedo decir algo, me siento así.

translation.en: That's why I like her so much.
- Abbey, you want to know something? - Yeah.
I'm on the spectrum too. - I have autism too.  - Ooh.
translation.es: Yo también estoy en el espectro.

translation.en: And all three of my kids do too.
So how could you have kids if you're on the spectrum?
translation.es: ¿Cómo tienes hijos si estás en el espectro?

translation.en: - You can do anything you want to. - It's up to the individual.
translation.es: - Puedes hacer lo que quieras. - Depende de ti.

translation.en: - It has nothing to do with autism. - Exactly.
translation.es: - No tiene que ver con el autismo. - Exacto.

translation.en: - Exactly right. I know that's-- - Do you take pills?
translation.es: - No tiene que ver con el autismo. - Exacto. - Sé que… - ¿Tomas pastillas?

translation.en: - You know what? I do. - Hmm.
- I do take medicine. Mm- hmm. - Do they make pills for pets?
translation.es: Tomo medicina. - ¿Hacen pastillas para mascotas? - Sí.

translation.en: They do make pills for pets.
We can take left turns in the conversation.
translation.es: La conversación puede terminar en cualquier lado.

translation.en: - I know. I know. - So I'm just giving you that heads- up.
No, I get it, and that's okay.
Do you like Mike Myers?
- I've never met him. - Me neither.
- What were you thinking about before? - I don't know.
- It just popped into my head. - Okay. That's fine. That's fine.
translation.es: - Solo se me ocurrió. - Bien. Está bien.

translation.en: Tell me about your dating history.
Dated a boy named Garrett in high school.
translation.es: Salí con un chico en la secundaria.

translation.en: - Okay. - I loved it.
- Okay. - I had fun.
So when you're going on a date,
what you're really doing is you're trying to make a friend, okay?
translation.es: lo que quieres es hacer un amigo, ¿sí?

translation.en: We want to ask questions as well as give answers.
translation.es: Queremos hacer preguntas y dar respuestas.

translation.en: And there are some things that I know you like to talk about
translation.es: Sé que te gusta hablar de algunas cosas

translation.en: and some things that maybe your date would like to talk about.
translation.es: y quizá a tu cita le guste hablar de otras.

translation.en: So what are the things that you like to talk about the most, do you think?
Candy Crush.
- Okay. - Going to the zoo.
Great.
I like watching African safari animals and sea animals.
translation.es: Me gusta ver animales africanos y animales marinos.

translation.en: - Documentaries… - I love documentaries. …about wild animals.
translation.es: - Documentales sobre animales salvajes. - Me encantan.

translation.en: Cool, so what we want to do is,
if this is sort of like your conversation during your date,
translation.es: Si esta es tu conversación durante la cita,

translation.en: then what you want to do is make sure that we leave enough room
translation.es: lo que quieres hacer es dejar un espacio

translation.en: for what your date might want to talk about, so maybe your date…
translation.es: para las cosas de las que tu cita quiera hablar.

translation.en: Let's come up with some things that he likes to talk about.
translation.es: Pensemos en cosas de las que puede querer hablar.

translation.en: Maybe he likes to talk about music, gaming.
translation.es: Quizá le guste hablar de música, de videojuegos.

translation.en: - Video games? - Mm- hmm.
- Ooh. - You like video games too, huh? Candy Crush is like a video game.
translation.es: - ¿También te gustan? - Candy Crush es como un videojuego.

translation.en: You just did something really good.
- Do you know what you did? - What?
You just found your first common interest, because if this is your conversation,
translation.es: Encontraste un interés en común. Si esta es la conversación, debes asegurarte

translation.en: you gotta make sure that, with all that you want to talk about,
translation.es: Si esta es la conversación, debes asegurarte

translation.en: we have to make sure there's room in the air for somebody else's words too.
translation.es: de que haya suficiente espacio para las palabras de alguien más.

translation.en: Come on over here with me on the floor. I'll sit over here.
translation.es: Siéntate en el piso conmigo. Me sentaré aquí.

translation.en: Perfect. So I'm gonna roll this to you, but I'm gonna roll a bunch of them.
translation.es: Perfecto. Te pasaré pelotas, muchas pelotas.

translation.en: - Ready? - Yeah.
So what do you like to do?
- What's your favorite color? - My favorite--
translation.es: - ¿Cuál es tu color favorito? - Mi color…

translation.en: - Do you like dogs? - Yes. My favorite color's--
translation.es: - ¿Te gustan los perros? - Sí. Mi color…

translation.en: - What'll you do tomorrow? - That's a lot of questions.
It is a lot of questions!
When somebody asks you a lot of questions like that,
translation.es: Cuando alguien te hace muchas preguntas,

translation.en: it's hard to figure them out and listen to what they're saying,
translation.es: es difícil entender y escuchar lo que dicen.

translation.en: which means I didn't get to know anything about Abbey.
translation.es: No logré aprender nada sobre Abbey.

translation.en: - Right? - Yeah.
Okay, so let's try something different.
Will you roll the balls back at me?
What's your favorite thing to do?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo que más te gusta hacer?

translation.en: I like to play with my dog.
translation.es: Me gusta jugar con mi perro.

translation.en: What's your favorite thing to do? Work out and swim.
translation.es: - ¿Qué es lo que más te gusta hacer? - Hacer ejercicio y nadar.

translation.en: Roll it back to me. Okay, great.
- What do you like best about swimming? - 'Cause mermaids swim.
translation.es: - ¿Qué te gusta de nadar? - Las sirenas nadan.

translation.en: I don't wanna go too far. There's dangerous animals.
translation.es: No quiero ir muy lejos, hay animales peligrosos.

translation.en: Roll it back. Good answer.
Yeah, that's true. Sharks can be scary, right?
translation.es: Es cierto, los tiburones dan miedo, ¿no?

translation.en: Speaking of sharks, I've been watching a movie called Soul Surfer.
translation.es: Hablando de tiburones, vi Desafío sobre las olas.

translation.en: Tell me more about that.
About a girl was surfing with her friend, and a shark bit her arm off.
translation.es: Una chica estaba surfeando con su amiga y un tiburón le arrancó el brazo.

translation.en: Yes. I saw her.
She did amazing things all around the world, even though she had one arm.
translation.es: Hizo cosas increíbles en todo el mundo, aunque tenía un solo brazo.

translation.en: How?
Well, I think a lot of determination. Do you think so?
- Yeah. - Do you know what you just did?
translation.es: - Sí. - ¿Sabes lo que acabas de hacer?

translation.en: - What? - You just had a conversation with me.
- Oh my gosh! -
You stayed on the topic. That made perfect sense to me.
translation.es: Te mantuviste en el tema. Tuvo mucho sentido.

translation.en: And we talked about it together.
May I shake your hand?
- Yes! - Yes!
- Yes! - That was awesome.
Abbey's primary challenge, I think, is going to be staying in the moment.
translation.es: Su desafío principal es permanecer en el momento.

translation.en: She's changing topic because her mind is catching so much interest.
translation.es: Cambia de tema constantemente porque su mente tiene muchos intereses.

translation.en: It's being able to put words to that
in a way which also brings the other person along,
translation.es: de una manera que involucre a la otra persona,

translation.en: so if she can do that,
then all of her flight of thought
is actually gonna be great and interesting and fun
and make for a great date.
It was really nice to meet you.
It was really nice to meet you too.
Thank you very much.
- Thank you. - Thank you.
- It was great to meet you. - Yeah, really nice to meet you too.
- Thank you so much. - I can't wait to hear how it all goes.
translation.es: - Muchas gracias. - Quiero saber cómo le va.

translation.en: Bye.
Bye.
Thanks again.
Okay, Abbey, do you want a sandwich?
Animation is my greatest passion.  Tell me about your company.
translation.es: - La animación es mi pasión. - Cuéntame de tu compañía de animación.

translation.en: I got the inspiration from Satoshi Tajiri, the creator of Pokémon.
translation.es: Me inspiré en Satoshi Tajiri, el creador de Pokémon.

translation.en: And he's on the autism spectrum, which is amazing.
translation.es: Él está en el espectro autista, es increíble.

translation.en: He started his company, Game Freak, when he was 17,
translation.es: Fundó su compañía, Game Freak, cuando tenía 17 años,

translation.en: so I started my animation company at age 14.
translation.es: así que yo comencé mi compañía de animación a los 14.

translation.en: It was fully launched with the help of my…
with my aunt and uncle.
So you teach animation to people on the spectrum?
translation.es: ¿Enseñas animación a gente en el espectro?

translation.en: That is true. It's good to see their work shine.
translation.es: Así es. Es bueno ver cómo brilla su trabajo.

translation.en: - Ready? - I'm ready.
This is my office.
Right here is my collection of all kinds of achievements
translation.es: Aquí está mi colección de todo tipo de premios

translation.en: that I've, um, earned over these years.
These are the flyers that I passed out when I was at San Diego Comic- Con.
translation.es: Estos son los volantes que repartí cuando estuve en Comic-Con.

translation.en: Hi, everybody. Mindy Da Vinci Lavender here.
translation.es: Hola a todos, soy Mindy Da Vinci Lavender.

translation.en: That's Mindy's voice. She's named after my dog,
translation.es: Es la voz de Mindy, tiene el nombre de mi perra

translation.en: and her personality is pretty much based upon my optimistic, happy self.
translation.es: y su personalidad se basa en mí, optimista y feliz.

translation.en: Best of all, there's even Bachelor's of Fine Arts,
translation.es: Lo mejor de todo es mi licenciatura en Bellas Artes

translation.en: Master's of Business Administration.
translation.es: y mi maestría en administración de empresas.

translation.en: The more awards I get, I think I need a bigger house.
translation.es: Recibo tantos premios que necesito una casa más grande.

translation.en: My ideal partner would be somebody who is running another company.
translation.es: Mi pareja ideal sería alguien que dirija otra compañía.

translation.en: Not only we see each other like lovers, but also work partners.
translation.es: No solo ser amantes, sino también compañeros de trabajo.

translation.en: So it sounds like you want your love life and your work life to almost be entwined.
translation.es: Parece que quieres que tu vida amorosa y tu vida laboral estén unidas.

translation.en: Into one.
Like a helix of a DNA structure.
translation.es: Como una hélice de la estructura del ADN.

translation.en: In Hollywood, Dani is meeting her good friend Devin for a drink.
translation.es: En Hollywood, Dani se encuentra con su buen amigo Devin para tomar algo.

translation.en: Oh, hey, how are you?
Nice to see you.
- How are you? - Good, fine, thank you so much, Devin.
Wow, this place is like… it reminds me of art, of France.
translation.es: Este lugar me recuerda al arte, a Francia.

translation.en: But did you know in France,
they have the biggest animation festival in the whole world?
translation.es: tienen el festival de animación más grande del mundo?

translation.en: You talk about animation nonstop.
translation.es: Hablas de animación todo el tiempo.

translation.en: It's so funny.
I want to hear about your dating life.
translation.es: Quiero oír sobre tu vida amorosa.

translation.en: - Okay. - How has that been going?
I'm about to start dating again.
I know. What made you decide to start dating again?
'Cause the last real one was maybe a few years ago or…
translation.es: Porque tu última cita fue hace unos años.

translation.en: Yeah, it's because, um… oh, I felt so lonely.
translation.es: Sí, es porque me siento sola.

translation.en: I'm stuck between a rock and a hard place.
translation.es: Estoy entre la espada y la pared.

translation.en: A lot of people on the autism spectrum think I'm too smart and too motivated,
translation.es: Mucha gente en el espectro piensa que soy demasiado inteligente y motivada,

translation.en: while neurotypicals think I'm too strange.
translation.es: mientras que los neurotípicos piensan que soy demasiado rara.

translation.en: Just wanna be sure they're motivated enough and have a good sense of hygiene.
translation.es: Quiero a alguien motivado y con buena higiene personal.

translation.en: And you're looking for a guy with pretty much no facial hair, right?
translation.es: Y buscas a un tipo sin vello facial, ¿no?

translation.en: Yeah.
I take insult to that. What is wrong with facial hair?
translation.es: Eso me ofende, ¿qué tiene de malo?

translation.en: - I don't like the bushy stuff. - Oh my God!
translation.es: - No me gusta lo tupido. - ¡Dios mío!

translation.en: How has your dating life been?
I got myself a fourth date coming up.
- Oh, wow. - Same girl.
This is fabulous.
I know.
What are you hoping, eventually, when you do find love?
translation.es: ¿Qué esperas que pase una vez que encuentres el amor?

translation.en: 'Cause I know it's gonna happen. Are you wanting to get married, have kids?
translation.es: Sé que sucederá, ¿quieres casarte y tener hijos?

translation.en: I've always wanted to get married and hopefully have a surrogate child.
translation.es: Siempre quise casarme y tener un hijo alquilando un vientre.

translation.en: So you're not ever gonna get pregnant in your life?
Yeah, because I can imagine labor's gonna really hurt.
translation.es: Sí, imagino que el parto duele demasiado.

translation.en: - Oh, thank you so much. - Thank you.
Cheers to us autistic people
that are coming over leaps and bounds
through our crazy lives growing up, to now possibly one day finding love.
translation.es: de nuestra infancia alocada hasta encontrar el amor.

translation.en: Cheers. You find your Prince Charming.
translation.es: Salud. Encuentra a tu príncipe azul.

translation.en: I find my Cinderella. Bam!
Bam!
Abbey is getting ready to step out on her first blind date.
translation.es: Abbey se prepara para su primera cita a ciegas.

translation.en: This is getting all over the place here.
- You're starting to look like Bette Davis. - No, I don't look like a witch.
translation.es: - Te pareces a Bette Davis. - No, no me parezco a una bruja.

translation.en: - It won't come off. It's like supersonic. - I want to look like a princess.
translation.es: - No sale, es muy fuerte. - Quiero parecer una princesa.

translation.en: - Come on, princess. - I want to look like a princess.
translation.es: - Vamos, princesa. - Quiero parecer una princesa.

translation.en: Stand up. Look in the mirror.
What do you think?
Pretty good.
Do a fashion pose.
- Are we ready to rock and roll? - Yeah.
- Here we go. - Let's go. Ah!
Hey, western screech owl.
Abbey is meeting David.
He likes lions
and being in a car wash.
translation.es: y estar en el lavadero de autos.

translation.en: He doesn't like horror movies or clowns.
translation.es: No le gustan las películas de terror ni los payasos.

translation.en: - Hey. - Hey.
Hey, it's nice to meet you. Oh, I like your shirt.
translation.es: Hola, gusto en conocerte. Me gusta tu camisa.

translation.en: I see you have sharks on your shirt.
Thank you.
- That's so cool. What's your name? - David.
- Nice to meet you. - What's yours?
- I'm Abbey. Nice to meet you. - Nice to meet you too, Abbey.
It's so nice.
What's your favorite animal?
The African lion.
Me too!
You know they made a live- action version of The Lion King and… with Beyoncé?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que hicieron una versión de El rey león con Beyoncé?

translation.en: Wow, I did not know that.
Yeah, she has an amazing voice.
I've been to Africa, since winter break.
translation.es: Estuve en África en las vacaciones de invierno.

translation.en: - You have? - Yes.
Oh, I'm so jealous.
I want to go too.
Going to Africa costs a lot of money.
translation.es: Ir a África cuesta mucho dinero.

translation.en: - It's too expensive. - Yeah.
My mom can't afford it just yet. She doesn't have enough money.
translation.es: Mi mamá no puede pagarlo. No tiene suficiente dinero.

translation.en: I know, but she's working on it.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero lo está intentando.

translation.en: - If we're a billionaire… - Yeah. Mm- hmm.
I was wondering, how old are you? I'm 26. How about you?
translation.es: - Me preguntaba, ¿cuántos años tienes? - Tengo 26 años, ¿y tú?

translation.en: - Twenty- three. - Wow.
- We're both in our twenties. - Yep.
You're not far from my age.
What's your favorite thing to get at In- N- Out?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo que más te gusta comer en In-N-Out?

translation.en: Only a plain cheeseburger. What about you?
- I went to In- N- Out yesterday. - What did you like to get from In- N- Out?
translation.es: - Fui a In-N-Out ayer. - ¿Qué te gusta comer ahí?

translation.en: I like the cheese fries, but I just don't eat them every day
translation.es: Las papas fritas con queso, pero no las como todos los días

translation.en: 'cause I know it's not good for you.
translation.es: porque sé que no son saludables.

translation.en: Where's the owl?  It's right there.
They call it the western screech owl.
Aw. Hi, owl!
Let's go look at some animals.
Great. Can't wait to take pictures of the ones I like.
translation.es: Genial, quiero tomar fotos de los que me gustan.

translation.en: Oh, a big snake.
Ooh, I'll add that to the collection.
Aw! Look at the little monkey!
They're called the common squirrel monkeys.
Oh, they're so cute.
There's a lemur.
Aw, lemurs!
They're so cute.
Look at the porcupine. Wow!
- Porcupine. - Yeah.
Be careful. Their quills are spiky.
Oh, look at the big birds. Those are eagles.
- Wow. - They kind of look a little aggressive.
Yeah. Only when they're on the hunt.
- And their claws are as big as my hand. - Wow.
translation.es: Las garras son tan grandes como mi mano.

translation.en: - Almost. - Yeah.
Is he trying to use his words?
'Cause they can't talk.
Maybe they want something.
At least they can do a screech.
- Yes, that's how they communicate. - Wow!
- Oh, he pooped! - Ugh.
What's your favorite bird?
I love all birds. - Do you like storks? - Mm- hmm.
translation.es: - Me encantan todas las aves. - ¿Te gustan las cigüeñas?

translation.en: - Herons? - Yes.
- But do you like falcons? - Yes.
- Pelicans? - Yes.
- Parrots? - Yes.
Me too.
Look at them falling in love with each other.
translation.es: - Me encantan los animales. - Mira, están enamorados.

translation.en: Cute.
Hello, you two adorable kitties.
- I love cats. - Mm- hmm.
I am a cat person.
Me too.
This is so fun.
Yes.
I love this place.
Thanks. So do I.
Let's just sit on the bench and just enjoy.
Can you describe your ideal partner?
I would like a woman who is similar to me, but not an exact copy, obviously.
translation.es: Me gustaría que sea parecida a mí, pero no una copia exacta, obviamente.

translation.en: I wouldn't expect to find a woman who was a radiant, unearthly beauty,
translation.es: No esperaría encontrar una mujer de belleza sobrenatural,

translation.en: but, obviously, I want a woman who is still fairly attractive.
translation.es: pero, obviamente, quiero una mujer que sea atractiva.

translation.en: A woman who's attractive to the point that when I see her,
translation.es: Que sea tan atractiva que cuando la vea

translation.en: I do not feel a desire to avert my gaze, you know?
translation.es: no sienta ganas de desviar la mirada.

translation.en: And a woman who is,
you know, who is very big on hygiene and well groomed.
translation.es: que sea higiénica y bien arreglada.

translation.en: I don't think that's asking too much, is it?
translation.es: No creo que esté pidiendo demasiado, ¿no?

translation.en: I hope not.
As he readies himself to get back into the dating world,
translation.es: Mientras se prepara para volver al mundo de las citas,

translation.en: James is meeting his younger brother William for dinner.
translation.es: James se reúne con su hermano menor, William.

translation.en: Hey. How's it going?
- Good seeing ya. - I'm doing just fine. How are you doing?
translation.es: - Qué bueno verte. - Estoy bien, ¿y tú?

translation.en: Good. Good. Doing well.
Okay. Good. Good.
Glad to hear that.
How was your day?
Oh, Nothing out of the ordinary happened, which is how I prefer it.
translation.es: No pasó nada fuera de lo común, como me gusta.

translation.en: - Yes. Yes. - Oh, that's a good thing.
So what's been going on lately?
Oh, well, actually, I have a date on Saturday night.
translation.es: De hecho, tengo una cita el sábado a la noche.

translation.en: - Really? - I'm quite excited about that.
Hopefully she'll have a good personality, and hopefully I'll get along with her.
translation.es: Ojalá tenga buena personalidad y pueda llevarme bien con ella.

translation.en: Yeah, that's exciting. Good for you.
So I don't know if you've heard yet, but Uncle Henry has a new girlfriend.
translation.es: No sé si te enteraste, pero el tío Henry tiene una nueva novia.

translation.en: - Oh, really? - Yes. Yes.
He apparently met her online, so he's had…
translation.es: Parece que la conoció en línea, así que…

translation.en: Despite his age, he's had more success with online dating than I have.
translation.es: A pesar de su edad, tiene más éxito que yo con las citas en línea.

translation.en: Well, hey, maybe you and he will both have new girlfriends at the same time.
translation.es: Quizá tú también tengas una nueva novia.

translation.en: That would be something.
It's definitely, uh… Look at that.
A mai tai for you, and the food is on its way, okay?
translation.es: Un mai tai, la comida está en camino.

translation.en: - Cool. Thank you. Appreciate it. - Nice. Thank you.
That's right. Cheers to your date this Saturday.
translation.es: Brindo por tu cita de este sábado.

translation.en: That's amazing.
When you're asking her questions and things like that,
translation.es: Cuando le hagas preguntas y todo eso,

translation.en: make sure it's not like you're just going through a checklist,
translation.es: asegúrate de que no sea como si tuvieras una lista,

translation.en: - like asking one, asking the next. - Certainly not.
translation.es: pasando de una pregunta a otra.

translation.en: Ask a few different questions, a few follow- up questions,
translation.es: Sigue la conversación y haz repreguntas,

translation.en: like, you know, so that way it kind of really shows that genuine interest.
You do a good amount of talking,
but at the same time, make sure that she's able to contribute just as much.
translation.es: pero asegúrate de que ella también pueda hablar.

translation.en: Yes.
Basically like, very much a fifty- fifty interaction.
It's a way for her to build confidence.
It helps, you know, say, Okay, this guy really truly is interested in me.
translation.es: Pensará: Este tipo está interesado en mí.

translation.en: - Fish tacos. - All right.
Look at that.
And the grilled… - Very nice, thank you very much. - Wow.
translation.es: - Y el pato asado. - Muy bien, muchas gracias.

translation.en: - You guys enjoy. - Thank you.
- That looks good. - Ah. Yes.
So if you were to say what you, uh… what you're looking for in a girl, what would you say?
Someone with whom I feel a close special bond
translation.es: Alguien con quien tenga un vínculo especial

translation.en: and someone whose presence enhances my life
translation.es: y cuya presencia realce mi vida

translation.en: and makes life feel more vibrant, more energetic, and colorful.
translation.es: y haga que todo sea más vivo, enérgico y colorido.

translation.en: That's good.
May I have some of your french fries, please?
- Sure. - Oh, yes, thank you.
I suppose maybe it would probably be okay, you know,
translation.es: Supongo que tal vez estaría bien,

translation.en: on a first date, to give someone a compliment on their clothing or jewelry or whatever,
translation.es: en la primera cita, darle un cumplido por su ropa o joyas,

translation.en: but it might not be so good to comment on their hair or body,
translation.es: pero no comentar sobre su cabello o su cuerpo,

translation.en: I'd have to imagine.
No, probably not.
If a woman told me she didn't like my hairstyle,
translation.es: Si una mujer me dijera que no le gusta mi peinado

translation.en: I probably wouldn't want to have a second date with her, for instance.
translation.es: Si una mujer me dijera que no le gusta mi peinado no querría tener una segunda cita con ella.

translation.en: The topic we're gonna talk about is sea creatures.
Oh, yes.
What's your favorite creatures that live in the sea?
I like mermaids, but they don't exist.
translation.es: Me gustan las sirenas, pero no existen.

translation.en: Like, I really understood the story of The Little Mermaid when I was younger.
translation.es: Realmente entendí la historia de La sirenita cuando era más chica.

translation.en: But now I don't need to apply… that no longer applies to me.
translation.es: Pero ahora ya no es relevante para mí.

translation.en: - Wow. - 'Cause I've come so far since then.
The Little Mermaid is one - of the list of my favorite movies. - Me too.
translation.es: La sirenita es una de mis películas favoritas.

translation.en: Hi, owl.
- Hi, guys. - Is he a mean owl?
She is actually very nice.
Now these guys are one of the largest types of owls in the world.
translation.es: Este tipo de búho es uno de los más grandes del mundo.

translation.en: - Hi, big owl. -
- What do you think? - It seems gentle.
What do you like to do for fun?
Oh, so they don't speak human.
When you're turning your head, we have seven neck bones.
translation.es: Nosotros tenemos siete huesos del cuello.

translation.en: These guys have 14,
so they have twice as many as us.
translation.es: así que tienen el doble que nosotros.

translation.en: - Ready to meet a sloth? - Yeah.
- Let's talk about sloths. - Come with me this way.
So sloths hang upside down their whole entire lives.
translation.es: Los perezosos cuelgan boca abajo toda su vida.

translation.en: They're never right side up like us.
translation.es: Nunca están con la cabeza para arriba.

translation.en: They sleep all day long. They sleep between 15 and 20 hours every day.
translation.es: Duermen todo el día, entre 15 y 20 horas por día.

translation.en: Hey, sloth.
Look at the tiny little fox.
Those are our fennec foxes.
- They're-- - Do they yip?
- They make high- pitched screeching noises. - Like, Ah!
translation.es: - Hacen ruidos agudos y chillones. - Como…

translation.en: - Yes, a bit like that. - They're from the north of Africa.
translation.es: - Sí, algo así. - Son del norte de África.

translation.en: - Have you been to Africa? - Yes.
And I'm gonna go there again in a heartbeat. And Abbey?
translation.es: Y volveré en un abrir y cerrar de ojos. - ¿Y Abbey? - Yo también.

translation.en: Me too. My heart will be beating, but it always does.
translation.es: - ¿Y Abbey? - Yo también. Siempre abro y cierro los ojos.

translation.en: If it weren't, I wouldn't be on Earth.
- Yeah. - Very true.
How would you like to come to Africa with me?
Yes, I would love that. My heart's gonna beat so fast.
translation.es: Me encantaría. - Mi corazón va a latir muy rápido. - Sí.

translation.en: I really had fun seeing the animals with you.
translation.es: Me divertí mucho viendo a los animales contigo.

translation.en: Me too.
I had a total fun blast with you.
Before you go, I think I have something special for you.
translation.es: Antes de que te vayas, tengo algo especial para ti.

translation.en: What?
Here you go.
Okay.
What is it?
- What is it? - It's a flamingo bracelet.
translation.es: - ¿Qué es? - Es un brazalete con un flamenco.

translation.en: - I got it from San Clemente. - Oh my God.
You did? Is it in Africa?
- Like from Africa. - Oh my God, I love it so much.
translation.es: - Algo así. - Dios mío, me encanta.

translation.en: Allow me to get that for you.
Thanks.
It's got a flamingo. I like it.
I'm glad you do.
Thanks.
Will I see you again?
Maybe one day. I'll think about it.
I'll let my mom know. Take all the time you need.
translation.es: - Le diré a mi mamá. - Tómate el tiempo que necesites.

translation.en: - Okay. - Bye.
Bye.
Bye.
Do you believe in love at first sight?
translation.es: - ¿Crees en el amor a primera vista? - Sí.

translation.en: I do. It's like, wow, this could be the greatest opportunity
translation.es: - ¿Crees en el amor a primera vista? - Sí. Podría ser la mejor oportunidad para conocer más a la otra persona.

translation.en: to get to know the person more.
translation.es: Podría ser la mejor oportunidad para conocer más a la otra persona.

translation.en: I'm hungry for more.
It's the power of, um… power of love.
- Are you going to… - Put on my makeup.
Dani is getting ready to head to downtown LA
translation.es: Dani se prepara para ir al centro de Los Ángeles

translation.en: for a first date.
- How are you feeling, Dani? - I am doing great.
Just putting on the magical touches
to show my dream boyfriend.
translation.es: para el novio de mis sueños.

translation.en: Can't guarantee he's your dream boyfriend, but you never know.
translation.es: No puedo garantizar que sea el novio de tus sueños.

translation.en: That's right.
You ready?
I am ready, Sandy.
A little nervous.
- Maybe you should have a shot of tequila. - Thanks, Sandy.
translation.es: - Deberías tomar un trago de tequila. - Gracias.

translation.en: - Thanks for your suggestion. - So you could relax.
translation.es: - Gracias por la sugerencia. - Para relajarte.

translation.en: Okay.
Just one shot.
Here's to your first date in two years.
translation.es: Por tu primera cita en dos años.

translation.en: Okay.
Yep.
Looks are a bonus, they're beautiful, but it can also be a bit seductive,
translation.es: La apariencia es importante, pero puede ser seductora,

translation.en: so I try to be very careful.
I always get attracted to some people with long hair, shoulder- length hair.
translation.es: Siempre me atraen las personas con cabello largo hasta los hombros.

translation.en: Especially some androgynous- looking guy, that I really love.
translation.es: Si son un poco andróginos, me encantan.

translation.en: Do you find that sometimes you can find yourself attracted to someone,
translation.es: ¿Crees que a veces te atrae alguien,

translation.en: but you think, Hang on, Dani, that person isn't right for me 'cause--
translation.es: pero te das cuenta de que no es la persona adecuada?

translation.en: Yeah.
He could be lazy or manipulative.
Adjust my hair, adjust that.
Dani is meeting Solomon.
He likes writing poetry
and good vibes.
He doesn't like messy eaters
translation.es: No le gusta hacer un enchastre al comer

translation.en: or aggressive birds.
- My name is Solomon. - I'm Dani. Nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too.
- These are for you. - Oh, lovely flowers bouquet.
That's so wonderful. Thank you so much.
Any time.
So how are you doing?
I'm doing fine, great.
Sorry, I'm kind of nervous.
- Yeah. - I'm nervous too.
Yeah, so, um…
I'm sorry, I'm just kind of nervous.
- Have you ever been on blind dates before? - I haven't, no.
translation.es: - ¿Ya tuviste alguna cita a ciegas? - No.

translation.en: Same here.
So what are your interests?
My interests, I do animation.
I teach animation to youth on the autism spectrum.
translation.es: Enseño animación a jóvenes en el espectro.

translation.en: That's really cool. How long have you been doing that for?
I guess I've been doing animation ever since 14.
translation.es: Hago animación desde que tenía 14 años.

translation.en: - A long time. - Wow.
- Fourteen? - Yep.
That's a good passion.
Well, I just finished, you know, my AA degree at Santa Monica College.
translation.es: Acabo de terminar mi diplomado en la Universidad de Santa Mónica.

translation.en: Oh, wow.
I'm majoring in Communication, like, Studies,
translation.es: Mi especialidad es estudios de la comunicación,

translation.en: so I'm gonna be working with kids, like, that have disabilities
translation.es: así que trabajaré con niños con capacidades diferentes

translation.en: and just teaching them, like, how to do the right stuff and--
translation.es: para enseñarles a hacer lo correcto y…

translation.en: This is perfect.
Yeah, yeah. I just want to teach them my perspective,
and, like, what I went through, and how I became the person I am today.
translation.es: y todo lo que me pasó y cómo me convertí quien soy hoy.

translation.en: And I got into the Law of Attraction. You know what that is?
translation.es: Y me interesa la ley de la atracción. ¿Sabes qué es?

translation.en: Law of Attraction? What's this about?
So it's about when you spread good vibes,
like, you attract that good energy and they give it back to you.
translation.es: atraes buenas energías y todo vuelve.

translation.en: Oh, wow.
It's very powerful.
I tried it with friends and family, and my relationships are through the roof now.
translation.es: Lo intenté con amigos y familiares y mis relaciones mejoraron mucho.

translation.en: I really want to find my soul mate,
translation.es: Quiero encontrar a mi alma gemela

translation.en: and that's why I started the Law of Attraction as well too,
translation.es: y por eso comencé con la ley de la atracción,

translation.en: to, like, actually, you know, find that abundance in my life, so…
translation.es: para encontrar esa abundancia en mi vida.

translation.en: Thank you.
Thank you so much.
- Of course. Enjoy. - Yeah, thank you.
Do you like anime?
Yeah, I watch some of it. Not all the time though.
translation.es: Sí, miro algunos, pero no todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Have you ever been to San Diego Comic- Con?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez fuiste a Comic-Con en San Diego?

translation.en: - I have, yeah. - You did?!
Yeah, it's really nice.
Oh my goodness.
I gotta use the restroom for a second. Be right back.
translation.es: - Tengo que ir al baño, ya vuelvo. - Está bien.

translation.en: Okay.
What are your first impressions?
Solomon. Oh, he is so attractive.
I mean, not just attractive from the looks,
translation.es: No solo es atractivo por su apariencia,

translation.en: but also, like, we have something in common.
translation.es: sino que también tenemos algo en común.

translation.en: Helping people of different disabilities, including autism, be themselves,
translation.es: Ayudar a personas con discapacidades, incluyendo al autismo, a ser ellos mismos.

translation.en: and it's like, oh, I'm just so nervous, and…
translation.es: Ayudar a personas con discapacidades, incluyendo al autismo, a ser ellos mismos. Estoy muy nerviosa.

translation.en: Oh, by the way, I'm just… in love.
We also share lots of hobbies.
- Did you just say you're in love? - Yes.
Hey, I'm back.
Hey.
I'm just very… so authentic about spirituality
translation.es: Soy muy auténtico en cuanto a la espiritualidad

translation.en: and just with the Law of Attraction. Like, I just love it so much.
translation.es: y a la ley de la atracción. Me encanta.

translation.en: So…
- Let's enjoy our drinks. - Mm- hmm.
It's really good.
So have you tried online dating?
Well, I did, but I was just a little too nervous.
I kind of… It kind of creeped me out.
- Yeah. - No, no, no, no, no.
Bad idea. Bad idea.
With me, online dating didn't go too well.
translation.es: A mí no me fue muy bien.

translation.en: - Yeah. - 'Cause I feel like I just get judged.
translation.es: - Sí. - Porque siento que me juzgan.

translation.en: You gotta get to know the person for who they are.
translation.es: Debes poder conocer a la persona.

translation.en: You know, I told you I'm into spirituality and all that.
translation.es: Te dije que me gusta la espiritualidad y todo eso.

translation.en: Yes, you sure do. Tell me about that.
I love it.
It's like, literally, I listen to… You okay?
I am in love with you.
Huh?
I think you are so hot.
- What's up, Solomon? - I wanna take a little break.
- Yeah, sure. - I'm sorry.
If you need to take a break, take a break.
translation.es: Toma una pausa si la necesitas.

translation.en: - I'm sorry. - It's okay.
Okay, maybe the situation's a little awkward.
translation.es: Quizá la situación sea un poco incómoda.

translation.en: I think I might have frightened him off.
